comments:
See attached project: 
We created an extension function with parameter of type 'int' (same for 'Integer') which delegates to a JAVA method. The function is not marked as an error, but at generation time the call fails:


3695 ERROR WorkflowRunner     - null:in test.ext on line 1 'List getSomethingInteger(List source,Integer value)'
org.openarchitectureware.expression.EvaluationException: null:in test.ext on line 1 'List getSomethingInteger(List source,Integer value)'
	at org.openarchitectureware.xtend.ast.JavaExtensionStatement.evaluateInternal(JavaExtensionStatement.java:71)

Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: argument type mismatch

Created an attachment (id=51749)
Small project reproducing this bug

The garanteed java type for int is java.lang.Number.
Note, that JAVA extension are not type checked!

traces.message: null:in test.ext on line 1 'List getSomethingInteger(List source,Integer value)'
